text: Saa ɛsuzu ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛhile ye wɔ ɛlɛka ne anu la anwo a , ɔbamaa wɔahɔ zo wɔava wuluwuluyɛlɛ wɔaha edwɛkɛ ne .
ref: Examining the points listed in the box can motivate you to continue preaching with zeal .
translated: The sun rose and the birds sang, and the children played happily in the fields.

text: Saa ɛyɛ mɔɔ ɛbahola biala la wɔ Gyihova ɛzonlenlɛ nu kɛmɔ kunlavolɛ raalɛ ehyianli ne yɛle la a , ɛnee ɔwɔ kɛ ɛnyia anwodozo kɛ ɛwɔ " diedi ne " anu .
ref: When , like the needy widow , you are doing all you can in Jehovah 's service , you have solid reason for believing that you are " in the faith . "
translated: It is a very serious matter that in Jehovah’s teachings there is a warning about the “death penalty.”

text: Saa ɛyɛ zɔ a , ɔbamaa wɔava ɛtane wɔahyɛ .
ref: Experience the peace of mind , unity , and divine blessings that come to those who have a forgiving disposition . - Rom .
translated: If this is true, the man will be punished.

text: Samuel toa zo kɛ : " Amaa yɛ nwo ayɛ se wɔ sunsum nu la , me nee me ye hɔle debiezukoalɛ wɔ asafo mɔɔ bɛfa yɛ sua zo aneɛ bɛdi gyima la anu .

translated: Samuel said: “We are not just spirits; I am here to help the community learn and grow together.”

text: Sime nee Haidee

text: Sonla ɛhye mɔɔ ɛnee le Falasiinli la hanle bɔbɔ kɛ saa ɔfa mɔɔ ɛnee ɔsuzu kɛ nwolɛ hyia la ɔto ndelebɛbo fofolɛ ne mɔɔ yɛnyia ye wɔ Nyamenle bodane ne mɔ anwo nee nwolɛ adenle mɔɔ yɛnyia ye wɔ Keleseɛne ɛzonlenlɛ gyima ne anu la anwo a , ɔle kɛ " fovolɛ zo ewula la . "
ref: This former Pharisee went so far as to say that compared with his new , enlightened understanding of God 's purposes and the privilege of the Christian ministry , what he once thought was important he now considered to be " a lot of refuse . "
translated: The children are playing together in the courtyard, and the elders are watching them with smiles, while the women are preparing food and the men are discussing matters of the village; later, they all gather around the fire to share stories and sing songs, saying, "Let us celebrate together."

text: Sunsum nwuanzanwuanza ne kola maa yɛ tumi maa yɛgyinla amaneɛnwunlɛ biala anloa .
ref: Holy spirit can empower us to endure any kind of adversity .
translated: The spirit gives us power to endure the hardships of life.

translated: When you have a child, you must nurture and guide them, for they will become the future of the community.

ref: Romans 8 : 6 answers clearly : " Setting the mind on the spirit means life and peace . "
translated: Listen, O people, and understand: “The spirit of the Lord is with us and will guide us forever.”

text: Wɔ 1919 , bɛkpale Baebolo sukoavoma ekpunli ekyi bie kɛ ' akɛlɛ nɔhavo nee nrɛlɛbɛvolɛ . '
ref: In 1919 , a small group of Bible students was appointed as " the faithful and discreet slave . "

ref: In 1979 , Lene and I welcomed the arrival of our fifth child , Daniel .
translated: In 1979, I met Lene and Daniel, and we went to the market together.

text: Wɔ 2006 nyianu bie abo , bɛbizale kpuya ɛhye wɔ ɛdendɛlɛ ko anu , ɔse : " Asoo yɛlɛyɛ mɔɔ yɛbahola biala la yɛaboa ' bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛpele kɛ bɛnrɛhɔ ahunleɛ la ' yɛamaa bɛalua adenle ne mɔɔ kɔ dahuu ngoane nu la anu ɔ ? " Ɛhye hanle Daniel ahonle kpalɛ . ( Mrɛ .
ref: At a convention in 2006 , Daniel was deeply touched by a talk that raised the question : " Are we doing all we can to help those who are ' staggering to the slaughter ' to get on the road to everlasting life ? "
translated: In 2006 they gathered together and discussed the issue of the forest, saying: “We must all work together to protect the forest, because if we do not, the children will suffer and the future will be lost—what shall we do?” Daniel replied.

text: Wɔ Gyihova mekɛ kpalɛ nu , " Yizilayɛma amuala " - sunsum nu Yizilayɛma kɔsɔɔti bazonle kɛ arelemgbunli nee ɛsɔfoma wɔ anwuma .
ref: In Jehovah 's due time , " all Israel " - that is , the complete number of spiritual Israelites - will serve as kings and priests in heaven .
translated: In Jehovah we gather, “Yizilayɛma amuala” – the spirit Yizilayɛma guides the believers and the faithful in their work.

text: Wɔ Nowa mekɛ zo , anwumabɔvolɛma bie mɔɔ bɛambɔ bɔ dodo la ' kpole bɛ tɛnlabelɛ ne mɔɔ fɛta ' wɔ anwuma la .
ref: In Noah 's day an unspecified number of angels " forsook their own proper dwelling place " in God 's heavenly family .
translated: In the new year, we will work hard; there are many tasks, and we will tackle them with determination and dedication at work.

text: Wɔ buluku ne mɔɔ se , The Last Days Are Here Again la anu , Benleravolɛ Richard Kyle hɛlɛle kɛ , " nzenzaleɛ mɔɔ ba arɛlevilɛ nu nee menli avinli basabasayɛlɛ maa menli ka kɛ ewiade ne bara awieleɛ , " titile saa ɔyɛ se kɛ bɛbade nzenzaleɛ ne nee basabasayɛlɛ ne abo a .
ref: In the book The Last Days Are Here Again , Professor Richard Kyle writes that " sudden change and social chaos create an atmosphere conducive to predictions of the end of the world . "
translated: In the book it says, “The Last Days Are Here Again,” and Benleravolɛ Richard Kyle explains, “When the end comes, we must gather together and share our stories, for only through sharing can we understand the truth and find peace.”

text: Wɔ edwɛkɛ ɛhye anu , yɛbazuzu ninyɛne nna mɔɔ ɔti awovolɛ bie mɔ ɛmboa bɛ mra bɛmmaa bɛnfɛta ɛzɔnenlɛ la .

translated: When the day begins, the light spreads across the land and the people gather.

text: Wɔmɔ suzu nwo nea !

ref: He assured them that he would be loyal to those who love him and keep his commandments .

translated: When the day is hot, the fire burns and Jehovah’s presence is felt in the night.

translated: When night falls and we gather together, we will celebrate with the community because of this.

text: Ɔhanle kɛ bɛfɛlɛ ye , Apun , noko ɔmaanle ɔ nye lale ɛkɛ , ɔluakɛ wɔ 1980 ɛvolɛ ne anu ɛnee bɛva bɛ sa bɛdo Alasevolɛ ne mɔ gyima ne azo .

translated: The king and the people, Apun, are not the same; he was born in 1980 and his age is now ...

text: Ɔhanle ndɛnebualɛ ne mɔɔ Awulae Gyisɛse bava ara " bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnze Nyamenle , nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnli Edwɛkpa ne " azo la anwo edwɛkɛ wɔ ye kɛlata ɛhye anu .
ref: In this he called attention to the coming tribulation when the Lord Jesus will carry out divine judgment on " those who do not know God and those who do not obey the good news . "

text: Ɔhilehilele nu kɛ tɛ bɛ gyima ti a bɛnyia anyelazo ɛhye a , emomu , Gyihova ɛlolɛ ne ati ɔ .
ref: He pointed out that their hope is not founded on their works , but on Jehovah 's undeserved kindness .
translated: The children are playing in the garden and they are happy.

text: Ɔhyia kɛ yɛnwu sonvolɛ nɔhavo ne .
ref: It is vital that we recognize the faithful slave .
translated: May we meet and not die.

text: Ɔhɛlɛle ɔmanle ɔ gɔnwo mɔ Keleseɛnema kɛ : " Dahuu yɛsɛlɛ yɛmaa bɛ , yɛyɛ Gyisɛse Kelaese ɔ Ze Nyamenle ne mo . "
ref: Writing to fellow Christians , he said : " We always thank God , the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , when we pray for you . "
translated: Greetings to the people of Keleseenema: “We are delighted to be here; we are the Gyisese Kelaese of Ze Nyamenle and you.”

text: Ɔka kɛ : " Yɛtɛnunle yɛ nwo ɛlɛ . "
ref: We have never regretted it . "
translated: He/she says: “We are together, we are one.”

text: Ɔka kɛ : " Ɔlua Gyihova moalɛ nee nzɛlɛlɛ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ yɛyɛle kɛ ɔboa yɛ ɔmaa yɛyɛ nzenzaleɛ la azo , yɛholale yɛdule yɛhɔle . "
ref: He says : " With the help of Jehovah and many prayers in which we asked for his help to make changes , we were able to make the move . "
translated: He said, “The Lord has given us many blessings, and we must be grateful and continue to work together in unity.”

text: Ɔkile nu kɛ : " Me abusua ne ngyegyelɛ yɛle kɛ nyevile azɛlɛkye , ɔngyakyi ɛlɛ .
ref: She explains : " My family faced one tragedy after another , and it seemed that God wasn 't helping us at all . "
translated: He/she said: “My family and I are together and we will not leave; we will stay here.”

text: Ɔkpondɛ kɛ ɔwu ɔmaa wɔ !
ref: He is willing to die for you !
translated: Don’t worry, everything will be fine!

text: Ɔle nɔhalɛ , saa agyalɛma kulo bɛ nwo a ɔmaa bɛ nye die . Noko nrenya nee raalɛ avinli ɛhulolɛ angome ɛngola ɛmmaa bɛnli ngyegyelɛ mɔɔ bɛyia ye wɔ agyalɛ nu la kɔsɔɔti anwo gyima . - Bɛgenga 1 Kɔlentema 7 : 28 .
ref: The romantic aspects of married life are delightful , but they alone do not equip a bride and groom for the tribulation that comes with every marriage . - Read 1 Corinthians 7 : 28 .
translated: If you do not treat a woman with respect, you will not have children; the one who does not honor his wife will not have a good life. – Proverbs 1:28

text: Ɔle nɔhalɛ kɛ yɛlɛ adenle yɛkpa mɔɔ yɛkulo la wɔ ninyɛne le kɛ nwomazukoalɛ nee gyima nwo , noko ɔwɔ kɛ yɛkakye kɛ yɛ fanwodi ne lɛ ye ɛweɛne na yɛ kpɔkɛzilɛ biala lɛ mɔɔ vi nu ba a .
ref: While it is true that we have the freedom to make personal choices regarding our education and career , we need to remember that our freedom is relative and that all decisions we make have consequences .
translated: We are grateful and we will continue to work together in this new year with hope and determination, so that we may achieve success and prosperity for everyone.

text: Ɔliele me kɛnlɛma .
ref: He gave me a warm and hearty welcome .
translated: Hello my friend.

text: Ɔlua anwosesebɛ ne mɔɔ Gyihova fa maa la ati , yɛbahola yɛagyinla sɔnea nloa , amaneɛnwunlɛ biala ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛmaa yɛnrɛdu koti .
ref: In Jehovah 's strength , we will withstand trials , not allowing troubling situations to be stumbling blocks .
translated: The Lord’s love and mercy are given to us; we will praise Him, and His blessings will be with us forever.

text: Ɔlua maanle ne ezukoa gyinlabelɛ mɔɔ zɛkyele la ati , ɛvolɛ 20 mɔɔ menvale menyɛle gyima ɛsesebɛ la amuala yɛle mgbane .
ref: Because of an economic crisis , 20 years of hard work came to nothing .
translated: The woman walked through the forest and found a hidden path, covering twenty meters before reaching the ancient stone altar.

text: Ɔlua zo ɛnee Pɔɔlo bahola aha kɛ : " Nyamenle ɛhile kɛ ɔsi ɔkulo yɛ la , na yemɔ a le kɛ , mɔɔ ɛnee yɛtɛda nwo yɛtɛde ɛtaneyɛlɛma la , Kelaese wule manle yɛ ! " - Wulo .
ref: Well could Paul say : " God recommends his own love to us in that , while we were yet sinners , Christ died for us . " - Rom .
translated: The man said to Paul, “We must keep moving forward, for we are bound by the path that lies before us, and we shall not falter. Let us go together!”

text: Ɔlua ɛhye ati , saa mɔɔ ɛnee yɛte nganeɛ kɛ ɔle kpalɛ na ndelebɛbo wɔ nu la ala a yɛgyinlanle zo yɛzile kpɔkɛ a , ɛnee yɛbɛlɛbɛlale yɛ nwo , ɔnva nwo kɛzi yɛzuzule nwolɛ la . - Mrɛ .
ref: Hence , were we to base our decisions solely on what we feel is good and reasonable , we might be deceiving ourselves , no matter how much we ponder the decision before us . - Prov .
translated: When the sun rises, we hear the drums and the people gather together, and we celebrate with songs and dances, and we will continue to honor our ancestors.

text: Ɔluakɛ wɔ mɛla nu saa bɛkpondɛ abusua ekpunli mɔɔ awie vi nu la abo a , bɛfa mrenyia .
ref: Because official genealogies were generally traced through the men .
translated: When we arrive at the house, the family will gather together and finish the work, then we will eat.

text: Ɔmaa Yɛgyinla Atipɛnema Ngyegyelɛ Nloa
ref: Helped to Resist Peer Pressure
translated: Mother Atipɛnema, we are united, blessings abound

text: Ɔmaa yɛnwu deɛmɔti bɛbɔle yɛ nee mɔɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ kɛ ɔyɛ ɔmaa yɛ la . Ɛnee Devidi lɛ banebɔlɛ .
ref: The Bible and Bible study aids , such as the journal you are reading , are a source of spiritual food that satisfies our need to know the meaning of life and God 's purpose for us .
translated: May we not die, for the sake of the Lord, and may He be with us. This is David’s prayer.

text: Ɔmaanle me anwosesebɛ kɛ memia me nee Nyamenle yɛ agɔnwolɛvalɛ ne anu na memmamaa me sa nu to . "
ref: He encouraged me to regain my spiritual strength and not to give up . "
translated: May my heart be steadfast and my soul remain with the Almighty forever, and may I never forget this.

text: Ɔmaanle ɛtane vole ɔ nwo zo .
ref: Then sin overwhelmed him .
translated: The man is going to the village.

text: Ɔmbu ɛtane nwo mgbonda . "
ref: It does not keep account of the injury . "
translated: The child is playing with a ball.

text: Ɔnle kɛ yɛ nee bɛ su kpolera wɔ bɛ adalɛ ngilehilelɛ ne mɔ anwo .
ref: We should not try to argue about all their false religious ideas .
translated: The child who does not listen will be punished at night.

text: Ɔnle kɛ yɛmaa ɔba ye zɔ ɛlɛ !
ref: Never may that be !
translated: Don't let the child go out!

text: Ɔnle kɛ yɛnyia bɛ angomedi subane ne bie ɛlɛ !
ref: May we never be tainted by such a selfish attitude !
translated: Don't be afraid, we will overcome the hardships and go now!

text: Ɔnva nwo kɛ menli dɔɔnwo zonlenle adalɛ nyamenle wɔ Azuyilɛ ne anzi la , bie mɔ lile nɔhalɛ manle Gyihova na bɛlile ye eni .
ref: Even though many worshipped false gods after the Flood , some faithful men continued to honor Jehovah .
translated: May we be guided and protected, that we may live in peace and harmony with the divine spirit and the holy presence of God.

text: Ɔnva nwo kɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ kola maa yɛ nye die la , mekɛ dɔɔnwo ne ala , bɛsi subane nee nyɛleɛ mɔɔ tia Gyihova ngyinlazo la adua .
ref: In addition to printed material , the globe - including remote parts of the earth - is blanketed with broadcasts via radio , TV , and the Internet .
translated: We are not able to do anything about it; we must rely on Jehovah’s guidance and follow His instructions.

text: Ɔti membizale Bɛtɛle ɛzonlenlɛ nwo adenle wɔ Toronto nyianu zɔhane abo .
ref: Therefore , I turned in a Bethel application at that convention in Toronto .
translated: The members of Betel are gathering in Toronto next week.

text: Ɔti ɔgengale yɛ mbuluku ne mɔ , ɔzukoale Baebolo ne na bɛzɔnenle ye .
ref: As a result , he read our publications , studied the Bible , and got baptized .
translated: Translation not available

text: Ɔvale ɔzɔle zo kɛ , " ɛhye mɔ a le bagua nu ɛdendɛlɛ mɔɔ bɛlumua mɔɔ I.B.S.A . ne mɔɔ wɔ Brazil la boale manle bɛbɔle nwolɛ nolo a . "
ref: These were " the first advertised public lectures given under the auspices of the I.B.S.A . in Brazil , " he added .
translated: He said, “If you want to see the bagua that’s in the I.B.S.A., we’ll go to Brazil later this year.”

text: Ɔvale ɛnelɛ kpole ɔbuale kpuya nwiɔ mɔɔ tendɛvolɛ ne bizale la .
ref: In a loud , clear voice , she answered two questions that the speaker posed .
translated: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

text: Ɔvi zɔhane mekɛ ne , Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne pɛ alesama tetedwɛkɛ ne sikalɛ kɛ : " Bie mɔ lɛ tumi ɛlɛsisi bie mɔ bɛamaa bɛanwu amaneɛ . "
ref: Regarding human history since then , God 's Word summarizes it this way : " Man has dominated man to his harm . "
translated: Our father God, the creator of all things, said: “If you have power, you must use it wisely and not let it bring suffering.”

text: Ɔwɔ kɛ yɛ kɔsɔɔti yɛkpa ɛleka mɔɔ yɛbagyinla la . - Mat .
ref: There is no middle ground . - Matt .
translated: There is a problem we must solve together. - Matt

text: Ɔwɔ kɛ yɛbeta yɛ asafo ne anwo wɔ " anwongyelelɛ " kpole ne anu ( Nea ɛdendɛkpunli 16 - 18 )
ref: During the " great tribulation , " we will need to remain closely associated with our local congregation ( See paragraphs 16 - 18 )
translated: There is also a night gathering of the congregation at “anwongyelelɛ,” as mentioned in verses 16‑18.

text: Ɔwɔ kɛ yɛfa asafo ne anu amra agɔnwolɛ kpalɛ na yɛmaa yɛ nwo anwosesebɛ , titili wɔ ngyegyelɛ mekɛ nu .
ref: We need to make close friends in the congregation and encourage one another , especially during difficult times .
translated: Unable to translate the provided text.

text: Ɔwɔ kɛ yɛfa yɛ adwenle yɛsie Nyamenle anwo ninyɛne zo .
ref: Therefore , it is vital to set our minds on the things of the spirit .
translated: There is a place where we keep Nyamenle’s sacred things at night.

text: Ɔwɔ kɛ yɛkulo yɛ mediema kɛ mɔɔ Gyihova se yɛyɛ ye la ! - 1 Dwɔn 4 : 20 , 21 .
ref: We must not hold back the love that Jehovah commands us to display ! - 1 John 4 : 20 , 21 .
translated: Whoever claims to love God yet despises a brother or sister is a liar; for whoever does not love his brother, whom he has seen, cannot love God, whom he has not seen.

text: Ɔwɔ kɛ ɔsiezie ɔ nwo kɛ ɔbagyakyi debie mɔɔ ɔ nye die nwo mɔɔ ɔbamaa yeayɛ ɛtane la .
ref: He must be prepared to give up even what is dear to him if it would put him in danger of falling into sin .
translated: He/she is a mother who hides her child and the bagyakyi.
